data.name: Lan Wei
data.description: Lan received her M.E. degree in Computer Science from the University of Science and Technology of China in 2024. She obtained her B.E. degree in Computer Science from Xiamen University in 2021.  Her main research interest is machine learning-based perception of optical microrobots.
